title: Do Your Best, Mia!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>*Huff*, *huff*.... Yes! I was faster! I beat Kanata!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata lost~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I see that you’re getting better, Mia.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You’re really agile too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ehehe.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>But I wonder if you can beat Kanata’s endurance....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>She has to do class, club activities, part-time work, cook dinner at home, and study at night.... She might have the best endurance out of everyone in Nijigaku.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eh.... Do you spend your days like that, Kanata? Do you ever play games or spend time online?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Of course~. There’s this game that Ayumu-chan told me about, and Kanata is addicted to it now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>You’re kidding, right? You play games despite living like that!? You’re amazing, Kanata....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Why don’t you clean our rooms with me, Mia-chan? Just on weekends would be enough.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Okay, I’ll do it. I’ll also do my laundry every day. I need to build up my endurance!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
